text: @FredTJoseph @GovernorTomWolf Ill spare the Ive been trying forever you know that, I just had to be tested for #covid19 bf has to self quarantine w/ me now he cant start a new job on Monday. We could use the #RENTRELIEF $reebamitch 🙏💙
